title: Is there a way to click things without also moving?
body:
For example, when I want to switch my items in their slots, my character moves in that direction. If I click on my map, my character also moves, is there a way to stop this? 

I see other players able to move their items around or click buttons in their options mid-game without moving.

replies.body: Try pressing the S key to stand still, then left click and drag your items. Your character only moves if you right click something, or target something with an ability.
Ohh ok I see, thank you :)

If it isn't the S key, it could be something else. You can also key bind it to something else if it's more comfortable for you. 
Open up your games settings
In-game>hot keys>player movement>player stop position.
You should be able to interact with the UI without moving your champ by using the left mouse button. It's right-click that issues movement/attack instructions.
Yeah I just read a couple of things about this. Awhile back I binded my moving click to my left click cause it felt more comfy but I'll just readjust. Thank you for the info :)
